content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Hello Ryanah, thank you for your interest in renting my apartment. I'm glad that you're here.

Regarding the rental price, I would like to hear your proposal. Please let me know what you have in mind.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to propose a rental price of 500 Euro per month.

Is this negotiable?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your proposal, Ryanah. While I appreciate your interest, I'm afraid that your offer is not quite what I was expecting. I would be happy to negotiate with you on the rental price, but I'm looking for something a bit higher.

May I ask what your budget is for renting an apartment in this area? This will help me understand your expectations and whether we can reach an agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 600 Euro per month. Is that negotiable?

I would also like to know more about the apartment. What are the features that it has?

Do you have any other questions?

Please let me know if you need any more information.

Thank you.

Best regards,

Ryanah Rahman
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your response, Ryanah. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, I'm afraid that my budget for renting it out is still higher than your offer of 600 Euro per month. I'm looking for something closer to 800 Euro per month.

As for the features of the apartment, it is a 25-square-meter studio apartment located in a central area of the city. It has a small kitchenette, a bathroom with a shower, and a comfortable bed. The apartment also has a balcony with a view of the city.

Is there anything else you would like to know about the apartment or the rental process?
name: Heinrich Heine
